basics.name: Jacob Molin
basics.currentTitel: M.Sc. student in Media Tech. and Engineering

profile: Driven, analytical and problem-solving-loving M.Sc. student with a big interest in technology, creation and logical thinking.
profile2: With experience in music production, customer service and logistics I have a unique insight in working with and delivering results in teams with many different types of personalities. I'm curious, take initiatives and I'm always looking on how to improve products and workflows. I'm interested in exploring how technology, with the help of Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and programming in general, can be used to make life better and more fun for people. I thrive on new challenges and love making people laugh!

education.degree: M.Sc. in Media Technology and Engineering
education.description: Focus on programming and system development. Courses in Web Programming, Algorithmic Problem Solving, Neural Networks, Machine Learning, AI and more. Expected graduation June 2022.
education.subDescription: In an agile team of seven where we researched implementation methods and developed an online price comparison service which collects data by web scraping online stores. We worked according to Scrum and my focus laid on collecting, comparing and organizing data by writing Python scripts.

education.degree: Audio Engineering Certificate (Music and Post Production Audio)

work.summary: Summer internship and part time during studies. The internship was based on two use cases involving automatic re-routing of bus traffic and speech-to-text tools control for bus drivers. I learned techniques like Docker, Azure, Angular, Valhalla Routing and OpenStreetMap as well as working in an agile team. During the fall I’ve continued working with automatic position data generation in Python and C#.

Employed by Linköping University to tutor students in programming during two sessions per week. Students drop in and ask programming-related questions. Most questions regarded C++, JavaScript and MATLAB.

work.position: Location / Production Assistant on film sets
work.summary: Setting up and maintaining film location sets for projects like "Solsidan" and "Hassel". Developed skills in managing multiple issues at once and running my own company.

Audio engineer for artists like Zara Larsson, Dua Lipa, Rev Run and Jared Leto. Music producer for artists like Broderick Batts, Taps and Diana Ebe. I learned how to work in and lead teams of very different minded people towards a common goal.
By leading sports activities for hotel guests during the day and running sound / light for stage shows at night I developed my skills in providing great customer service.
Full-time periodically and part-time during studies.

work.position: Various summer and part time jobs
work.summary: Like store clerk at Hemköp during university studies, outdoor cinema technician, janitor and warehouse worker.

commissionOfTrust.summary: As one of two auditors, being responsible for auditing the accounting and financial situation of NAFFI for the academic year 2019/2020.
I was responsible for running board meetings and ultimately responsible for the weekly and overall operations. I learned how to be responsible for a team and making sure all work was on track.

Projects in and outside of school.name: Media Technology - Bachelor Project
Projects in and outside of school.summary: In a group of seven where we researched implementation methods and developed an online clothing price comparison service which collects data through webscraping online clothing stores. My focus laid on collecting, comparing and organizing data. Implemented in Python.

Projects in and outside of school.name: Battleship AI Agent – Project in the course "AI for Interactive Media"
Projects in and outside of school.summary: Together with two fellow students we’re now developing an AI agent to solve the game Battleship using a Convolutional Neural Network. We’re using Python and TensorFlow to implement the agent. Go to [github.com/jacobmolin/battleship_ai_agent](github.com/jacobmolin/battleship_ai_agent) to see the GitHub repo.

Projects in and outside of school.name: EnRoute – Project in the course "Advanced Web Programming"
Projects in and outside of school.summary: Together with two fellow students we built an online version of the board game "Ticket to Ride". We used techniques like Node.js, React, Socket.io. See the GitHub repo with link to demo at [github.com/angelgravel/enroute](github.com/angelgravel/enroute).

Projects in and outside of school.name: Project in the course "Audio Physics"
Projects in and outside of school.summary: Developed, in a group of three, an online frequency spectrum analyzer with JavaScript and React.

Projects in and outside of school.name: Project in the course "Communication and User Interface"
Projects in and outside of school.summary: With focus on the user interface, the group of four developed an application for diabetics to log the blood sugar and carbohydrate intake to calculate a bolus dose of insulin. The goal was to simplify the everyday life of diabetics and letting them spend less time managing their disease. The application was developed as a mobile phone adapted website using with JavaScript, React and Node,js and was named "diatot".

Projects in and outside of school.name: Project in the course "Machine Learning for Social Media"
Resume and portfolio website: jacobmolin.com
Projects in and outside of school.summary: Developed my own resume and portfolio website for fun! Implemented with React and Next.js

internships.summary: Various recording / audio engineer internships in professional studios with international producers and songwriters like Al Shux (Jay-Z, Alicia Keys) and David Jost (Selena Gomez, Tokio Hotel). Among many things, I recorded A-list artists, built a vocal booth and rewired an entire studio.

interests: Playing and listening to music, exercising, experiencing nature, listening to podcasts.
